acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Test asserts Issue.namespace equals read namespace\n- [ ] Existing helpers updated if needed
description: **Problem**\nIssue views now include namespace, but we lack a focused test to lock down propagation for Issue (not just IssueSummary).
design: Add a unit test in src/daemon/query_executor.rs that exercises Issue::from_bead via the query executor path and asserts Issue.namespace == read namespace. Use a non-core NamespaceId to ensure it's not defaulted.
title: Tests for namespace propagation in issue views
